data.eml:eml: The first description of the leaf-mining Nepticulidae (Lepidoptera) feeding on the South American plant genus Liabum, Asteraceae

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Stonis, Jonas R., Diškus, Arūnas, Remeikis, Andrius (2015): The first description of the leaf-mining Nepticulidae (Lepidoptera) feeding on the South American plant genus Liabum, Asteraceae. Zootaxa 4040 (5): 576-582, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4040.5.6
